name: Ships vs Sharks (Solanima)
description:
For the WWU Game Jam 5, Winter 2017.

The theme: "It's not the end of the world, but you can see it from here."

An arcade shoot-em-up where you fight giant shark robots of all kinds as you fly over ruined cities! Five action-packed stages that get steadily more difficult! Collect options that follow your ship and protect it in many ways!

Update: Winner of Best Audio/Visual category at the Jam!

Controls

Arrow Keys - Move

"Z" - Hold to Shoot

"X" - Bomb (You can carry only one, so use wisely)

Made by Team S.E.E.S.

Enemy Programming, Level Design, Project "Coordinator": Solanima

Player and Powerup Programming: Sno (Snail Jo)

Art: Tothegoogleplex

Music, Sound, and Graphic Design: 4our A/V
